title: Discover the Data that Drives Insight
description: Explore a wide range of open and commercial data sets across different categories

title: Publish & Discover Data
description: Publish data - post your dataset for sale in ARIUS Market. Enter the url, add a description, and hit 'publish'. Discover data - browse, search, and filter data in Ocean Market.

title: Buy Data
description: Spend OCEAN (or other) to buy a dataset's datatokens.
